div.p:
Preparing students for lifelong success through comprehensive
academics, community partnerships, and character education.

td.a: May 4th Board of Education Meeting/Public Hearing to be held via Zoom
td.br: Click this news story for details concerning our May 4, 2020 Board of Education Meeting/Public Hearing which will be held via Zoom.

td.a: Our Centre City Art Teacher, Miss D'Alessandro uses 3D printer to create mask extenders for hospital staff
td.br: On behalf of Mantua Township School District, Miss D'Alessandro is printing 24 hours a day to try and make a tiny dent in the much needed supplies. Please click the story and attached pdf to read more. We are so proud of Miss D'Alessandro!

td.a: Mantua Twp School District Message of Hope
td.br: Our Mantua Twp School District family misses all of you! Click this news story to view a video of our staff sending messages of hope.

td.a: Daily Dose of Love featuring Mantua's own, Jo Crouthamel
td.br: Jo Crouthamel was featured in the Jesse Lewis Choose Love Movement's Daily Dose of Love. Click this story to read the article. Great job Jo!

We are continuing our partnership with 1st Day School Supplies to bring you a convenient, hassle-free, risk-free way to purchase school supplies for your child for next year. The supplies will be waiting on your child's desk on the first day of school! Please click for more details.
Please click the link above to access updated information regarding COVID-19

a.aria-label: Show all articles from News and Announcements

div.p:
Thank you very much for choosing to visit our school district website. We are very proud of our students and of our school community. During the last six years it has been an honor and pleasure to lead our school district through several initiatives that have the potential to improve the trajectory of learning for our students while positively impacting our community. Working alongside a dedicated Board of Education, skillful staff, supportive parents, and inspiring students, our district created a shared vision a short time ago and it has been an honor to serve as the district's educational leader during this exciting time.
After implementing a comprehensive approach to social/emotional character development, the Mantua Township School District was awarded the distinguishing honor of National District of Character in 2018, as one of only five districts nationwide. During the 2019 school year, the district was awarded $1.8 million in Pre-K expansion aid from Governor Murphy's administration so that all students who turn four years old prior to October 1st have access to a full day, high quality educational program at no cost. We have also been able to engage in a series of significant community partnerships, among them Rowan University which has designated Sewell School as a Professional Development School for the 2019-20 school year...

div.style: width: 410px; height: 230px; margin: 0 auto; overflow: hidden;

p.a: Mantua School District Message of Hope April 2020.mov

div.noscript: Please enable Javascript when viewing video pages.

ul.li: I will always tell the truth, do my own work, and respect the property of others.
I will think of others before myself.
I will always be open to new learning.
I will be responsible for everything I do, think, and say, and I will be accountable for all of my actions.
I will lead others by modeling good behavior and caring for those around me.
I will practice self-control in my words, actions, and emotions, especially when I find it most difficult.
I will treat others fairly and help those in need.
I will make every effort to give back to the community.
I will give my best effort in everything I do, including responsibilities I like and those I don’t like.

div.b: No Faculty or Staff are listed at this time.
